TestCase.Title: Check if the ePassport is BAC protected
TestCase.Purpose: Try to identifying if the connected ePassport is a protected BAC ePassport

Precondition.Description: Perform a cold reset of the card in order to ensure all temporary data is removed.

TestStep.Description: Select the ePassport application with a plain SelectApplication APDU
TestStep.TechnicalCommand: command = new ByteString("00 A4 04 0C 07 A0 00 00 02 47 10 01", HEX); response = card.gt_sendCommand(command);

ExpectedResult.TechnicalResult: assertStatusWord(SW_NoError, card.SW.toString(HEX), FAILURE); assertMatchValue("", response, FAILURE);
